issue.title: [C++][CI] Make s390x build non-optional
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11768](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11768). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that big-endian support seems to stable (apart from Parquet), we should make the Travis-CI s390x job required, so that failures don't pass unnoticed.
